Workflows - Developer
Skip to content
Workflow
Â¶
These are the model elements in Atlan related to governance workflows.
Reference documentation
This is reference documentation covering the entire Atlan model. It is
not
the best place to start when trying to understand how to manage resources in Atlan.

Properties
Â¶
These attributes are specific to instances of
Workflow
(and all of its subtypes).
workflowActionChoices
Â¶
List of workflow action choices.
workflowConfig
Â¶
Details of the workflow.
workflowCreatedBy
Â¶
Username of the user who created this workflow.
workflowDeletedAt
Â¶
Deletion time of this workflow.
workflowRunExpiresIn
Â¶
Time duration after which a run of this workflow will expire.
workflowStatus
Â¶
Status of the workflow.
workflowTemplateGuid
Â¶

Â¶
Deletion time of this workflow.
workflowRunExpiresIn
Â¶
Time duration after which a run of this workflow will expire.
workflowStatus
Â¶
Status of the workflow.
workflowTemplateGuid
Â¶
GUID of the workflow template from which this workflow was created.
workflowType
Â¶
Type of the workflow.
workflowUpdatedBy
Â¶
Username of the user who updated this workflow.
